sense.def:
Direct
je tak, ki gre ali je naperjen naravnost proti nekemu kraju ali predmetu.

seg.quote: Are there any direct flights to Athens?
Why hadn't he gone direct to the lounge?

sense.def:
Dejanja, ki so
direct
, storimo odkrito ali ne da bi vpletali še koga drugega.

seg.quote: ...the direct intervention of the managing director.
This move is a direct challenge to the government.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
directed at a particular person or thing
, je naperjeno proti neki osebi ali stvari ali naj bi vplivalo nanjo.

seg.quote: ...a question that John had evidently directed at me.
This is a fundamental question to which we should all be directing our attention.

sense.def:
To direct someone somewhere
pomeni nekomu povedati, kako nekam pride;

seg.quote: Can you direct me to the cemetery?

sense.def:
Če nekdo
directs a project or a group of people
, organizira neki projekt ali je odgovoren za skupino ljudi.

seg.quote: No one seemed to be directing the operation.

sense.def:
Če nekdo
directs a film, play, or television programme
, odloča, kako mora biti neki film, igra ali televizijska oddaja posneta ali izvedena.
